website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable to hold and use, this all natural volcanic pumice stone works hard on calluses and tough skin.
pros: A quality pumice stone crafted from 100% pure volcanic lava
Has a good shape, making it easy to hold and apply pressure to hard skin
Use the handy rope loop to hang the stone out to dry after use
cons: Some users find the coarseness rough and takes time to get used to

customer_reviews.title: Wet, lather, scrub , rinse, lotion guaranteed feet be soft
customer_reviews.text: I should have done a before and after but my feet were so cracked it was a bit embarrassing, I had a few deep cracks but I swear by this stone it works just one try and my cracks are gone I say a couple more scrubs my feet will be completely smooth again
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: My sister swears by this pumice stone for smoothing her feet! So much so, that she convinced me to get it. I like this so much because it is much stronger and longer lasting than many of the pumice stones I have used in the past. I just hang it on a hook in my shower and sonits easy to remember to use it often on my heels. I can already feel a difference and it’s only been a couple of days!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I started to use this pumice stone my feet became much softer and whiter! Lately my skin on feet was yellow and rough, but not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Good Pumice Stone
customer_reviews.text: I love this pumice stone! Has a good weight and doesn't get all gunked up soap (if you hang it from a shower caddy). Also works very well!! Takes half the time to do a better job. Get this!! You will love it!! No more cheap drugstore pumice stones for me!! Update: Took this on a 10 day trip to Europe. Put in a sandwich bag, then into my suitcase. Big mistake! Started to really stink around day 5! Probably because it never fully dried. Now when I travel, I wrap it in a paper towel, then put it in an open sammie bag. Works much better
customer_reviews.author: Scarab

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying an actual pumice stone. I have a lot of dead skin on my feet and I will use it once a week going forward. Pleasantly surprised with the weight, girth, and quality. This is a great pumice stone for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Product was broken when received
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't even rated a quarter of a star item was broken upon receiving it, the item is not eligible for any type of return stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Miranda

customer_reviews.title: No "call(o)us" review here
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome pumice stone. After buying a piece of junk one from Walmart which was about as fake a pumice stone as you can buy (pretty much sand paper) this was a nice welcome surprise. It also looks very cool. Like something that just shot out of Mauna Kea. My daughter likes using it too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anthony Gross III

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: This stone does not remove dead/dry skin. Stone arrives with instructions to follow before first use. After following those, I used the stone and was surprised to feel no difference in my skin. The next use I had some dirty areas on the bottoms of my feet. I scrubbed and scrubbed with the stone and the stains did not change. Normally a pumice stone removes the top layer and stains disappear. I am very disappointed by this product. It would cost me as much to return it as the refund would be so I'm stuck with it but be warned and think twice before you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Was really hesitant to try this...I am so glad I bought it! I stand a lot for work and walk around on concrete and this is doing wonders for my heels!
customer_reviews.author: Halle K

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this pumice stone , I had a good routine , first I soak my feet at warm water for 5 minutes, than I you the creamy scrub for few minutes and after that I use this stone with light pressure and some motions , than I use moisturizer, and it worked very well for me, thanks
customer_reviews.author: ipaywithvisa

customer_reviews.title: and it's awesome! No need for a pedicurist when you have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a natural lava pumice stone, and it's awesome! No need for a pedicurist when you have one of these hanging in your shower. You'll have consistently soft smooth heels if you use this regularly. I have tried so many other "pumice stones" over the years and this is the best one I've come across.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Don't scan the QR code
customer_reviews.text: Giving them one star because they tricked me with the promise of getting a gift by scanning a QR code. I didn't know that the QR code was directly logging into the account to put in a review. That's not cool.
customer_reviews.author: N.Khan

customer_reviews.title: It left my entire bathroom black. The stone sheds ...
customer_reviews.text: It left my entire bathroom black. The stone sheds "black dust." I picked it up and my entire hand and fingernails were black. I tried to use it after I showered but ended up cleaning my entire shower. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: It reminds me of the pumice stone that my mum had when I grew up, she removes all the dead skin without hurting her leg, and many years have passed but I continue to use exactly this pumice! I am pleased with how clean and makes my heels smooth and well-groomed
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Quick rubs every couple of showers and seems to take off the dead skin easily. Rinses off cleanly too
customer_reviews.text: My rough flaky heels have never been smoother. Quick rubs every couple of showers and seems to take off the dead skin easily. Rinses off cleanly too. Used to use the handled multi smoother tools and it would take many scrubs and a long time to get the same result. Had to swap the rope out for a zip tie so everything would dry faster. Very solid rock that should last a long time. Fits comfortably in my med sized hands.
customer_reviews.author: Bellicosa

customer_reviews.title: Best stone ever (seller sucks though)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Wifey loved it and will definitely buy again. Edit: seller asked for product review in exchange of “price”. Guess what? Once you review it and go through the price process it gives an error and no one responds to help. The product itself is fine but this selling practice is pure dishonest and cheating.
customer_reviews.author: Biggus Dickus

customer_reviews.title: Voted by ME the Best heel experience.
customer_reviews.text: Stop buying cheap heel scrubbers, Buy this pumice stone and you'll never go back. I used it once and it not only cleaned the heel but softened the skin which absorbed the lotion. Making my heels look sandal ready without a trip to the nail shop.
customer_reviews.author: STF

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep feet looking nice
customer_reviews.text: The pumice stone is not too rough on the feet, but does a nice job of wiping away dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cord, not jute
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but as advertised image was slightly different from what I got in the mail. The cord cord was green and made from plastic. I would have preferred 100% natural jute as stated in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Quality Stone
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and has enough different textures (from different hole sizes) that you can pick from a soft, delicate scrub or a more rough one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: but I like the fact that it's natural and comes with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This pumice stone not only works, but I like the fact that it's natural and comes with a rope attached that can hang in the shower for easy use. If you have any doubts, put them aside, and buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis P White

customer_reviews.title: He says it works great! I was worried little bits would break off ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is a gymnast and uses this pumice stone to file off the calluses on his hands. He says it works great! I was worried little bits would break off and make a mess, but that is not a problem whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingMom

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: This unfortunately came with its box open which put me off at first but luckily it was also shrink wrapped. The directions tell you to wash it with soap first which I appreciated because that may not have occurred to me. I struggle with my hands a lot because of my carpal tunnel so the shape of this is really great and easy to grip for me without having to put a lot of strain on my wrists. I used this one time so far and while soaking my feet in some dr. teals and then afterwards applied foot cream and my feet look and feel so much better. Would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ok... this thing is amazing. I just finished using it for the first time and it transformed my feet. Put a nice lil’ foot mask on to get lush and now I’m feeling deluxe. So soft and smooth. I have tried many tools to use on my feet and this is by far the best. The jute rope is nice to hang dry the stone and it is easy to clean, despite being porous. I will buy this again and again - it’s amazing. Highly, highly recommend, sistahs, mistahs and they-istahs!
customer_reviews.author: Aly J

customer_reviews.title: Unique and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the holes were large and uneven. But it has worn into a nice shape. Perfect for distance runners.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Worked remarkably well.
customer_reviews.text: This worked remarkably well. I have tried numerous methods to get rid of dried skin on my heels and this stone was the best. Works especially well if you soak your foot first
customer_reviews.author: LBJB

customer_reviews.title: Arrived shattered most probably due to poor packaging/mishandling during shipping
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews however this item arrived shattered. It appears to be very delicate so unless it makes it through the shipping process its not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Nyzio

customer_reviews.title: Great pumice stone
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, and a great stone. The little rope on it is handy to hang up using a suction cup hook to stick it to the shower stall wall. It easily removed the dry calloused skin from my heels, used in conjunction with a good foot cream to moisturize. It's a nice size to fit in your hand. If you want a good natural pumice stone that makes quick work of calloused dry heels, look no farther.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Literally amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've used cheap Walmart pumice stones in the past and was skeptical of spending more than a couple bucks on one but boy is it worth it! This little guy cleans up my feed 10x better than the cheap ones I use to buy. It's a perfect size to hold. I'm 5'1" with little hands and it's not too big but still a nice large size. It is very rough and durable. I've had it for several months now using it a few times a week and it hasn't gotten dull at all. I took the rope tie off because it was inconvenient to me but it did look nice!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I are always on our feet and these things work great.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well on our feet. My wife and I are always on our feet and these things work great.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Much more effective than my previous 2 pumice stones. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was great and the instructions were useful. My initial two uses were very positive. My previous two pumice stones (of a different brand) must have been synthetic or some other type of almost useless product whereas this stone is very good. I think this one is going to be a keeper. If I had more time to try this out before posting this review, I bet it would be a five star, not a four star. Oh, heck. I am going to upgrade now to five star as I see nothing about this product not to like.
customer_reviews.author: maxpr1

customer_reviews.title: Overly Rough & Porous
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this or it will take all your skin off. It's extremely coarse and uneven and it will leave your skin raw and burning if you aren't very gentle. Also, unlike other stones I've tried, this one actually collects all the dead skin while you're using it. It is extremely difficult to "clean" it off afterward and rather gross. I will say it is very light, sturdy and has a good shape to it so it is easy to use. Just be very conservative at first so you don't hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Mostly Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it works
customer_reviews.text: I normally use just a regular gray pumice stone. Decided to do a little research on which are best and found lava pumice stones are highly rated. Received this one yesterday and am less than impressed. With my normal pumice stone I can see and feel the dry dead skin coming off my feet. I don’t get any of that with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: I GREW UP USING THIS STONE AND I ALWAYS HAD VERY SOFT FEET AND HEELS. I HAD BROUGHT 1 FROM IRAN . I HAD IT FOR YEARS AND LOST IT WHEN I MOVED TO CA FROM EAST COAST. NOTHING MADE MY HEELS AS SOFT AS I USED TO HAVE. I HAD NO IDEA I COULD FIND ONE ON AMAZON. AFTER FEW USE MY FEET HAVE STARTED GETTING SOFT AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Senobar D.

customer_reviews.title: Simpler is better
customer_reviews.text: I have a motorized roller grinder to take care of my calluses but as thick and leathery as they are, I found it was at best a touch-up solution. It took an annoying amount of time while the underpowered motor would stall and protest if I tried to get any real grinding done. This is just a rough rock you can get any desired pressure out of, proving sometimes simpler is better. The only real difficulty is how dead skin tends to collect in the pores, so make sure to buy a little bristle brush to clean it out with.
customer_reviews.author: Hecatoncheire

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to use my new pumice stone. I wash it with warm soapy water as suggested. After my fisrt use I noticed it began to rust. I cleaned it again. After two days of not using it, I noticed a small little plant growing out of it. I threw it away. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shimia Buie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should probably know that this stone has many great reviews because they send you another product once you leave a review. With that being said, it still deserves all the hype. This is the first time I've used a pumice stone and wow does this thing work so well. Paired with a foot cream, my feet have never looked better! Keep in mind that it probably will feel a little rough but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amil

customer_reviews.title: A box of nothing
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package it appeared the box had been previously opened and the product within removed. If I could give this a rating lower than 1 star I would, seeing as all I got was a broken cardboard box Clearly not much effort was put into shipping don’t buy this stone if you actually want to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Raszewski

customer_reviews.title: Not what it's cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: I've heard of people using a pumish stone before, but it rubbd my skin off and d not get the dry shkin I was trying for. Dan
customer_reviews.author: DNUCKS

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I've used plenty of pumice stones but this one is my favorite. After soaking my feet it sloughed off the dead quickly (but wasn't too rough), then finished with some oil and my feet were so soft. I wear steel toed boots everyday so my can get pretty rough, but this stone works great for me. Be sure to wash the stone first as it says in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Nightlinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice pumice stone, good shape
customer_reviews.text: I had a pumice file but it just seemed to tear my skin up, not smooth it down. This stone is a nice shape to hold in our hand and it works very nicely on smoothing rough spots. I use it primarily on my heels where my thick socks and boots seem to irritate my skin. I keep it in my shower, hung by the rope it came with.
customer_reviews.author: MJJJ

customer_reviews.title: Skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this to srub off some of my actinic keratosis and it really smoothed my legs well. Another use I will try (with a different stone of course) is to rub off bots on my horse when the flies start to lay them. Have heard that pumice works great rather than using a razor or picking off my hand. Will write another review to let people know if this indeed does work!
customer_reviews.author: Janet F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Pumice Valley's pumice stone comes in a simple, natural brown box that reminds you that the product inside is natural...from the earth itself. It's sized just right for most hands and includes a cord for secure holding. Using it was easy and I found the stone to be effective at removing dead skin. The price was right, and I'd recommend anyone looking for a dead-skin remover to try the Pumice Valley's Pumice Stone. True story, bro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get excited by a stone but the thing works. Give it a try
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain, works as described
customer_reviews.text: Not really the most effective, but can't complain. Much gentler than a pedegg or file so thats nice. I don't feel like my foot is raw, but still a lot more work than a traditional file. I personally don't always have time to soak for 5 minutes after a very long day, so that being a necessity makes me less motivated, but thats just me.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Will Update!
customer_reviews.text: The texture of the product is quite authentic. Once you pick up the stone, you’ll automatically know you’re dealing with the real thing. Even though I haven’t gotten to using it, I know for sure the results will be spectacular. I’ll be sure to give in an update once I’ve become aquatinted with the Punic stone.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great natural variations
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old one which felt almost manufactured. This one definitely feels more natural since it’s got some nice variations in the sizes of the divets. Plus I like the slight color variations as well. I recommend rinsing it thoroughly with hot water before using so it removes some of the loose particles in it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: A good product for cleaning corns and horny skin on the ...
customer_reviews.text: A good product for cleaning corns and horny skin on the heels! Not for one year I use to relieve painful sensations in the soles of the feet. It helps. Every day, after this procedure, 10 minutes in the evening, after a good softening of the feet in the hot foot bath. This product has a convenient shape and good surface roughness. This is a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my feet have been dry and gross for the last few weeks. After using it for the first time, my feet were soft and touchable. The only thing I wish was different was the loop for hanging. It is too short for me to hang from the bathtub so it can properly dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this pumice stone and haven’t used it yet, but saw I was “one of 100” winners so I’m trying to claim my free prize. Pumice stone looks good and has a nice weight to it! I assume it works well and am excited to have my first ever pumice stone. I will leave a more thorough review after use.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Russo

customer_reviews.title: each piece varies
customer_reviews.text: i'm sure each piece of lava has its own qualities but this once is not nearly as good on my heels as my last one of the brown lava variety. i will use this for a little while and then replace it with the other kind which seems to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Farley

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is working great for me! My feet are extremely extremely dry! I was getting painful Cracks! And Bc now Nail salons are close I can’t get pedicure! So I gave a try to this product! So every day during shower I use this then I put lotion! I think any lotion will work, depends on ur skin. I use my baby’s lotion. and so far my feet got better by 80%! And I’ve been using it just for a week!
customer_reviews.author: Nayri

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and would buy again better than all others and wonderful price.
customer_reviews.author: McAlldp

customer_reviews.title: This Pumice Stone Healed My Heels
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pumice stone since March of this year now, and it has been so beneficial for my heels. I wish I had remembered to do a before/after picture, but beforehand, the cracks in my heels were very deep, especially one where I could feel a fairly deep dip at the end of my right heel. Now, I have no cracks in my heels anymore at this point! It may take some time for some of the deeper cracks to go away, so don't expect miraculous results in the first few weeks. I can't say for everyone, but in my experience, have patience and use the pumice stone every shower. Overall, this pumice stone helped my heels heal!
customer_reviews.author: Azizi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pumice stone
customer_reviews.text: I rubbed my heel well and this pumice stone was my real assistant. My heels look smooth and well groomed and quite easily !!!
customer_reviews.author: ElenK

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in my hand
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice size stone and well shaped for holding while using. I've had smaller ones in the past but gave up on them because they were small and not easy to use. This one also has a finer grain to it than others I have tried, so it works really well without ripping up skin.
customer_reviews.author: TSpencer

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: This stone is the real deal and I appreciate that. Using it for the first time was definitely a great experience. The stone is actual pumice and I thought it wasn't going to be. If you're looking for real pumice, this is it! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: ERICK H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best quality pumice stone ever purchased. Somewhat large. Took a minute 2get accustomed 2gripping it. Extremely porous. You can see the dead skin cells in the pores. Scrub your 🦶 at least twice a week [or more]. You’ll get results for sure. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BlackboSHEmia

customer_reviews.title: but I would like to try again
customer_reviews.text: This product came in time and well packed. I give it only three starts because I was expecting something more effective. I did not spend too much money on it, but I would like to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Capri2020

customer_reviews.title: Surfer feet are finally saved
customer_reviews.text: I’m a surfer with feet that walk across all sorts of surfaces, none of them clean. Parking lots. Trails. Sides of the road. I’d been using the cheese grater type foot scrubber and my heels were still cracked and dirty looking. On a whim I bought the pumice stone to see if it would improve the situation (which wouldn’t be terribly hard). I didn’t have high hopes or any expectations. Well, immediately my feet were so much cleaner, and after 5 days they looked night and day different. My feet were no longer an embarrassing train wreck for the first time in years. Fully recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Use now
customer_reviews.text: No more cracked scaly feet. Ive had dry cracked feet since I was a kid, I just discovered these stones are a thing and I'm a dude. Use with confidence. Now my feet don't hurt all the time. You literally just scrub the dry cracked stuff right off.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I suddenly started getting dryness and peeling on my once beautiful feet and I panicked. A friend told me about this product, and, after using it, I see that it is pretty darn amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A bit beat up upon recieving
customer_reviews.text: This stone was a bit chipped up when taking it out of the box. Not terrible but i expected it to be in better shape. it is usable and works fine. Probably not worth $10 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Liddy

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I PROBABLY COULD FIND A STONE OUTSIDE BETTER TO USE THAN THIS!!! VERY CLUMSY TO HOLD AND DOES NOTHING ON YOUR FEET!!! WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: JENR

customer_reviews.title: Good Results!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using now for 2 weeks. I wanted to actually get some results from the product before reviewing. So far, so good. I like the size. It's easy to hold and use for circular motions on my feet. My feet didn't get this way overnight, so wanted to have the experience. Use 3 times a week followed by putting shea butter on my feet and it has worked to change the skin on my feet; smoother and softer to the touch!
customer_reviews.author: R.M. Barras

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product but by other reviews I thought this was gonna do a lot more. Still pleased though as I don’t have super dry or cracked feet so I don’t need much in the first place. But still not as expected
customer_reviews.author: Katie Zander

customer_reviews.title: good qulity
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time as soon as I received it today. It seemed to be removed to some extent while using it, but I think it has a dramatic effect depending on the condition of the callus.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pumice stone is by far the best I have ever used. Just one use and my scratchy feet are nice and smooth. The real test will be when my husband uses it, he works construction and has typical manly feet. But I am very confident this little majic stone will work wonders on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Grand Canyon
customer_reviews.text: Yep my feet look like the Grand Cannon and this is a lifesaver better than the old cheese grader, have to spend a little more time with it but it is like a message and rubs the dead skin away after a couple of days my feet have relief.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This stone just kind of roughs the dry skin up on your feet (you need to peel or pull it off after using), but since it’s not sharp or rough enough it doesn’t really remove it. Waste of time for me.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Used a couple times a week for the last 6 months and it works well. Easy to control how much you’re taking off. Much less scary to use than a metal one with little blades.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Lava rock rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Eliminates callouses without tearing apart your skin (perfect for diabetic feet). Washes out easily. The rope attached allows easy hang and dry. Does not leave discoloration on the skin (minimal black powder rinses away after first rinse and have not seen any more over continuous use). Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry skin, but not for heavy calluses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stone to help ward off the accumulation of heavy calluses on my heels, but it doesn't do much as far as removing existing calluses. It does do a good job of buffing off dry skin and smoothing heels, but it won't remove a callus.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this pumice stone. My feet look and feel amazing. As a ER Nurse who works almost 14 hour shifts I cannot tell you how refreshing it is to use this and follow it up with a good body sugar scrub. Yes please!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Finally tried it
customer_reviews.text: worked great on my feet and rub it gently on my dry elbows and that worked great to. Will have to use on my feet a couple times to get rid of the callus on the sides of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It’s somehow coarse enough to remove the heavy stuff but fine enough for literally your entire body. A permanent part of my exfoliating routine!!! Great great solution to removing dead skin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess P

customer_reviews.title: Very rough/abrasive
customer_reviews.text: I have had horrible cracking calluses. This stone got rid of them very quickly. It is quite rough and abrasive which is just what I needed. Using this stone in the shower with a moisturizer afterwards has really improved things.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C. Grey

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, works well
customer_reviews.text: Worked way better than I thought it would. Be careful not to rub your hands on it aggressively, I accidentally tore mine up washing it BUT, it did wonders for my feet, and I like the more natural material and low impact packaging. Also it’s nice looking and doesn’t shed plastic particles into the water supply.
customer_reviews.author: Teague O.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Arrived repackaged so I have no idea what this is. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 333

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pumice stone with no preference for kind or brand and not really knowing which one I should buy. I am very happy with my choice and will buy this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Quality Lava Stone
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my fair share of lava/pumice stones....this is definitely quality! The majority of pumice stones I’ve owned have crumbled with the slightest pressure....not so with this stone. This is a quality piece of lava stone, and it’s already obvious that it’s going to last for years....and the twine loop is a nice touch for hanging on a hook in the shower. The shape also fits nicely in hand
customer_reviews.author: Caton Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great stone and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing stone and I highly recommend it. It has clear instructions and always leaves skin feeling smooth and fresh. I would suggest including a suction hook to stick in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Boogoo

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: First time using particular item. Very pleased. I had a corn on baby toe, used those medicated toe pads, didn't help.. after showering used on feet(very smooth) then on corn..fantastic!!! Before my toe was sore to the touch..after use of pumice, no soreness!! Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Foyla Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but I have this hard spot underneath my foot and I thought that the pumice stone would take care of it... I use it, but it really didn't do much of anything...
customer_reviews.author: Acadia

customer_reviews.title: Smells so bad after only 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these pumice stones for years prior to moving. I recently purchased a new one and it’s been working great, until today when I noticed the most unpleasant rotten trash-like smell emanating from it. So bad I had to immediately throw it out. Disappointed because the return window closed just before this happened. I had it for only one month and was careful to let it dry it between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Schoonover Leung

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: It works really well! I was worried about it degrading (crumbling) but it's held up and is very effective for the stubborn areas on my heels that are so difficult to keep clean and smooth, especially in the summer. (I had to rate "sheerness", but I'm not sure what that's all about.) A good purchase though 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: LMoses

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that the stone has the perfect roughness. It also has a balanced weight to it, not super light but also isnt heavy where is geta annoying . I was starting to get some callouses on the bottom of my feet from walking around barefoot but after using the stone just a couple times, my feet look smooth and feel great. I usually never give such perfect reviews but this stone really is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great for my minimally rough feet!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was perfectly minimal and cute. Product arrived as it was expected to, completely intact! It's pourus & rough enough for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for this product. I did not like how it felt / texture and it didn't really work that well for me. However, it may be great for others.
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: Smooth feet
customer_reviews.text: This is a big part of my foot health/beauty regime. Covid has taught me to be quite independent. I am good at painting myself too. $ in bank!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I’m Filipino and we use a rock similar to this in the Philippines to get rid of dirt on our skin. But this rock isn’t smooth and will hurt if you use it in the same manner as we do! Disappointed! 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Estrella White

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use but I just find that it’s not quite abrasive enough for my purposes. I’m better off just using a callus remover instead
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's a rock!
customer_reviews.text: It's a rock with holes! Mine is super full of holes and looks like it won't break. It does have a crack in the back, but I dunno, it's a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Donnell Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not too rough
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but looks just as pictured. Packaged nicely - recyclable small box. Has a small strap on one side I guess to make it easier to hold and has very easy to follow directions for use on side of box. Feels right when holding it in my hand. So far so good. Will use tomorrow. It doesn’t look or feel too rough so I imagine it will be easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. It is a bit dirty when the plastic wrap is removed so I’d recommend the shower or the sink. I didn’t have to scrub my heels just gently did a few swipes and my feet are smooth again.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W.

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Would definitely order again and recommend. This works much better for me than the pumice stone with fine holes. I saw significant results the first use and my feet are super soft after the third use. Works great wet or dry and barely had to use much force.
customer_reviews.author: Leecie

customer_reviews.title: Did the Trick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who was complaining about dry skin on the bottom of his feet. He has used it several times and says it has done a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Wits'End

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use !!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to go with some callus remover and foot soak. The process took about a half hour but feel and look better than when I have a professional pedicure
customer_reviews.author: Divineone

customer_reviews.title: An effective and eco-friendly foot file
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part about this item is how it comes in minimalistic and relatively eco friendly packaging. It is effective and has improved the overall integrity of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: China crap
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product until I reordered it... it's made in China. Enough said!!
customer_reviews.author: The Schaellings

product_meta.title: Pumice Stone - Natural Earth Lava Pumice Stone Black - Callus Remover for Feet Heels and Palm - Pedicure Exfoliation Tool - Corn Remover - Dry Dead Skin Scrubber - Health Foot Care
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackAs a natural stone of volcanic origin, pumice’s healing properties have been prized by healers since ancient times.
Today medical cosmetology recommends the use of natural pumices for exfoliating the skin, giving your body health and beauty. 

Color, size, and texture will vary from stone to stone due to the natural formation of pumice.

How to use a pumice stone:

1. Soak your feet or other area of callused skin in warm water, optionally adding sea salt or 1-2 drops of Lavender or Jasmine essential oil.
2. Dampen the pumice stone in the same water for ease of use.
3. For the heels, palms, and feet, gently rub the pumice stone in soft circular motion.
4. After cleansing, rinse your body with cool water.
5. Apply a soothing lotion.

Attention!!!

- For hygienic purposes, do not share previously used pumice stones with others.
- Do not use on delicate, soft skin or on inflamed, red skin.
- Do not scrub skin with a pumice stone.
- For pre-ventive maintenance, two times per week is sufficient.

How to care for a pumice stone:

- After use, thoroughly rinse the pumice stone with soap and water.
- Allow it to dry.
- Replace your pumice stone if it’s showing signs of wear and tear.

If you add to your cart and buy now, you will receive your pumice stone in a few days and you can start enjoying its benefits.
feature_bullets: NATURAL BLACK PUMICE STONE - Black foot stone signifies high quality because pure volcanic lava is naturally black. When feet pumice is any other color than black, this means it isn’t composed of pure earth lava
PUMICE STONES are an effective tool for rejuvenating and cleansing the skin of the hands, feet, elbows, and heels, and for removing calluses and corns, hard, dry, rough and dead skin

HEALING PROPERTIES - Contains trace elements - Massages and stimulates blood flow - Relieves fatigue, promotes relaxation - Ideal callus remover - Remove dead skin for healthy feet - With daily use, your skin will become baby smooth - Soft, silky skin like after SPA treatments
PERFECT SHAPE AND SIZE - Easy and comfortable to hold in your hand - Natural hang rope that holds its shape well after getting wet
THE GIFT OF HEALTH - Pumic stone is the perfect gift for your loved ones. It is the most natural method of softening rough skin. Treat your friends and family to the gift of youthful, healthy skin
